div.style: display: flex; padding: 10px 8px 10px 8px; backgroundstretch: 50% 65% 49% 32% 50% 32% 49% 65%; background-image: url(http://amap-activity.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/shaolin/lowcode/eyrie/ed091f1e5aef933522d5c3417a140f3a.webp); justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: row
